hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas:The Prophet (ﷺ) prevented `Uthman bin Mazun from that (not marrying), and had he allowed him, we would have got ourselves castrated

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ التَّبَتُّلِ وَالْخِصَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What is disliked of not marrying and of getting castrated
